Comment: Cuts to even mid-service federal employees won’t survive a court challenge , so this is more like a-tough talkin’.  They can change the game for new hires, but when the job market reignites, it’ll likely cost the Treasury more in recruitment and retention “immediately goodies” (pretty much cash bonuses .. like a voluntary military needs to add during times of war).
